com.domain.project.core.graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.domain.project.core.graph.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the nodes and edges of the graph read from the database

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graph

        public Graph(boolean isCityGraph,
     float xOffset,
     float yOffset,
     float width,
     float height,
     int id)
        Constructs a graph instance
        Parameters:
        isCityGraph - - defines if it is a graph of cities or camps
        xOffset - - float value representing the top left origin of the graph on the x axis
        yOffset - - float value representing the top left origin of the graph in the y axis
        widht - - float value is the width of the graph
        height - - float value is the height of the graph
        id - - the unique integer value assigned to this instance

      • generateGraph

        public void generateGraph(java.lang.String filename,
                 playn.core.GroupLayer graphLayer,
                 int player_id)
        Constructs a graph instance
        Parameters:
        filename - - the path to the database file containing the graph raw data
        graphLayer - - the GroupLayer that all the imageLayers in this graph instance are added to
        player_id - - the unique integer value of the player assigned to this graph
